price: 26. Na sima, tozuaki ba oyo bapengwi, mpe tala ndenge nini (etumbu) na ngai ezalaki!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
